description: Create an S3 bucket for application logs in us-east-1 with a 6-month retention policy.
author: Fernando Trevino
notes: Bucket name is predefined and must exist in us-east-1.
Lifecycle configuration should expire objects after roughly six months (~180 days) to satisfy log retention requirements.
Applying public access blocks, default encryption, and tags follows S3 best practices even when not explicitly requested.
